title: Which is best, IT at GRRR or CSE at CMR, Hyderabad? - Quora
tags: International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad (IIIT-H)

response.answer_text: I recommend you to go for CSE (CMR) . I’m suggesting you a good option as I have been the student of GRRR(IT). I would recommend you, no even urge you not to choose the college as it’s a hell apart from academics and all!!! Hope you make the right choice!!!!
